name: FENIX GROUP, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Monitor H.R.4350/S.1605, National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022 and H.R.4432/S.3023, Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2022.
Advocate for integrated tactical edge networks in FY23 NDAA. Monitor P.L.117-103 Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2022 and FY23 Defense Appropriations Act.
Support funding for commercially available satellite imagery in the FY23 Commerce, Justice, Science and Department of Defense Appropriations bills.
